sections.title: Setup
sections.text:
Download the loader here: https://mega.nz/folder/cr5nQKqL#xCj5BVBXkvPtsUnCDjKwsQ

Download our support tool here: https://mega.nz/file/ioJQ3TAK#khDxBBZ0_LiX__6zEnfr2N6PG1_HDuv271J5rFus7yQ

Make everything green in the support tool before downloading the loader!

sections.title: Instructions
sections.text:
Download and install Microsoft Visual C++ from: https://aka.ms/vs/17/release/vc_redist.x64.exe.

Uninstall any antivirus; deactivation is not enough.

Disable Real-Time protection in Windows Defender; you should use tool: https://www.sordum.org/9480/defender-control-v2-1

Close any game or launcher (Steam, Origin, Bnet, etc.) and disable any overlay (Discord, Geforce Experience, MSI Afterburner, MedalTV, etc.).

Disable both Game Mode and GPU Acceleration in your Windows settings.

Make sure you don't start the game or launcher with admin privileges.

sections.title: First Start
sections.text:
Download your loader by clicking on the button at the bottom of this page and move it to your USB flash drive.

Open the loader as admin and login with your key (in the email received after your purchase).

Click on "Start" and wait for the success popup.

Close the loader, and you can remove your USB from your PC.

Start the launcher, then open your game.

Make sure your game is set to "Borderless" or "Windowed" in settings.

sections.title: The Essential Troubleshooting
sections.text:
Restart your computer and simply retry again.

Install Microsoft Visual C++ by visiting https://aka.ms/vs/17/release/vc_redist.x64.exe.

Completely disable Windows Defender by using the tool available at https://www.sordum.org/9480/defender-control-v2-1.

Uninstall any other antivirus software, including Windows Defender.

Uninstall FaceIt, Vanguard, ESEA (anticheats which always run in background).

Disable any overclocking and remove applications like MSI Afterburner. Reset BIOS settings to default if needed.

Ensure that Secure Boot is disabled in the BIOS settings.

Disable Memory Integrity in Windows Device Security - Core isolation.

Ensure that Windows is up to date (Windows 11 is recommended).
